text: Carlos Balá (born Carlos Salim Balaá on August 13, 1925 in Buenos Aires – September 22, 2022) was an Argentine actor. He was known for his roles in Canuto Cañete, conscripto del 7 (1963), Las locuras del professor (1979) and Un loco en acción (1983). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Carlitos Balá at Montevideo.com.uy Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine comedians Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Carlos Balá
